Verses: 1 ungal Irudhayam Kalangaadhiruppadhaaga; Dhevanidaththil Visuvaasamaayirungal, Ennidaththilum Visuvaasamaayirungal.
2 en Pidhaavin Veettil Anega Vaasasthalangal Undu; Appadiyillaadhirundhaal, Naan Ungalukku Solliyiruppen; Oru Sthalaththai Ungalukkaaga Aayaththampannappogiren.
3 naan Poi Ungalukkaaga Sthalaththai Aayaththampanninapinbu, Naan Irukkira Idaththile Neengalum Irukkumpadi, Naan Marupadiyum Vandhu Ungalai Ennidaththil Serththukkolluven.
4 naan Pogira Idaththai Arindhirukkireergal, Vazhiyaiyum Arindhirukkireergal Endraar.
5 thomaa Avarai Nokki: Aandavare, Neer Pogira Idaththai Ariyome, Vazhiyai Naangal Eppadi Arivom Endraan.
6 adharku Yesu: Naane Vazhiyum Saththiyamum Jeevanumaayirukkiren; Ennaaleyallaamal Oruvanum Pidhaavinidaththil Varaan.
7 ennai Arindheergalaanaal En Pidhaavaiyum Arindhiruppeergal; Idhumudhal Neengal Avarai Arindhum Avaraik Kandum Irukkireergal Endraar.
8 pilippu Avarai Nokki: Aandavare, Pidhaavai Engalukkuk Kaanbiyum, Adhu Engalukkup Podhum Endraan.

9 adharku Yesu: Pilippuve, Ivvalavukaalam Naan Ungaludanekooda Irundhum Nee Ennai Ariyavillaiyaa? Ennaik Kandavan Pidhaavaik Kandaan; Appadiyirukka, Pidhaavai Engalukkuk Kaanbiyum Endru Nee Eppadi Sollugiraai?

10 naan Pidhaavilum, Pidhaa Ennilum Irukkiradhai Nee Visuvaasikkiradhillaiyaa? Naan Ungaludane Sollugira Vasanangalai En Suyamaai Sollavillai; Ennidaththil Vaasamaayirukkira Pidhaavaanavare Indhak Kiriyaigalai Seydhuvarugiraar.
11 naan Pidhaavilum Pidhaa Ennilum Irukkiradhai Nambungal; Appadiyillaavittaalum En Kiriyaigalinimiththamaavadhu Ennai Nambungal.

12 meyyaagave Meyyaagave Naan Ungalukku Sollugiren; Naan En Pidhaavinidaththirkup Pogirapadiyinaal, Ennai Visuvaasikkiravan Naan Seygirakiriyaigalaith Thaanum Seyvaan, Ivaigalaippaarkkilum Periya Kiriyaigalaiyum Seyvaan.
13 neengal En Naamaththinaale Edhaik Ketpeergalo, Kumaaranil Pidhaa Magimaippadumpadiyaaga, Adhai Seyven.
14 en Naamaththinaale Neengal Edhaikkettaalum Adhai Naan Seyven.
15 neengal Ennidaththil Anbaayirundhaal En Karpanaigalaik Kaikkollungal.
16 naan Pidhaavai Vendikkolven, Appozhudhu Endrendraikkum Ungaludanekooda Irukkumpadikku Saththiya Aaviyaagiya Veroru Thetraravaalanai Avar Ungalukkuth Thandharuluvaar.
17 ulagam Andha Saththiya Aaviyaanavaraik Kaanaamalum Ariyaamalum Irukkirapadiyaal Avaraip Petrukkollamaattaadhu; Avar Ungaludane Vaasampanni Ungalukkulle Iruppadhaal, Neengal Avarai Ariveergal.
18 naan Ungalaith Thikkatravargalaaga Viden, Ungalidaththil Varuven.
19 innum Konjakkaalaththile Ulagam Ennaik Kaanaadhu, Neengalo Ennaik Kaanbeergal; Naan Pizhaikkirapadiyinaal Neengalum Pizhaippeergal.
20 naan En Pidhaavilum, Neengal Ennilum, Naan Ungalilum Irukkiradhai Annaalile Neengal Ariveergal.

21 en Karpanaigalaip Petrukkondu Avaigalaik Kaikkolgiravane Ennidaththil Anbaayirukkiraan, Ennidaththil Anbaayirukkiravan En Pidhaavukku Anbaayiruppaan; Naanum Avanil Anbaayirundhu, Avanukku Ennai Velippaduththuven Endraar.
22 skaariyoththallaadha Yoodhaa Enbavan Avarai Nokki: Aandavare, Neer Ulagaththukku Ummai Velippaduththaamal Engalukku Ummai Velippaduththappogira Kaaranamenna Endraan.
23 yesu Avanukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Oruvan Ennil Anbaayirundhaal, Avan En Vasanaththaik Kaikkolluvaan, Avanil En Pidhaa Anbaayiruppaar; Naangal Avanidaththil Vandhu Avanode Vaasampannuvom.
24 ennil Anbaayiraadhavan En Vasanangalaik Kaikkollamaattaan. Neengal Ketkira Vasanam Ennudaiyadhaayiraamal Ennai Anuppina Pidhaavinudaiyadhaayirukkiradhu.
25 naan Ungaludane Thangiyirukkaiyil Ivaigalai Ungalukku Sonnen.
26 en Naamaththinaale Pidhaa Anuppappogira Parisuththa Aaviyaagiya Thetraravaalane Ellaavatraiyum Ungalukkup Podhiththu, Naan Ungalukku Sonna Ellaavatraiyum Ungalukku Ninaippoottuvaar.

27 samaadhaanaththai Ungalukku Vaiththuppogiren, Ennudaiya Samaadhaanaththaiye Ungalukkuk Kodukkiren; Ulagam Kodukkirapragaaram Naan Ungalukkuk Kodukkiradhillai. Ungal Irudhayam Kalangaamalum Bayappadaamalumiruppadhaaga.

28 naan Poven Endrum, Thirumbi Ungalidaththil Varuven Endrum Naan Ungaludane Sonnadhaik Ketteergale. Neengal Ennil Anbullavargalaayirundhaal Pidhaavinidaththirkup Pogirenendru Naan Sonnadhaik Kuriththu Sandhoshappaduveergal, Enenil En Pidhaa Ennilum Periyavaraayirukkiraar.
29 idhu Nadakkumbodhu Neengal Visuvaasikkumpadiyaaga, Nadappadharkumunname Idhai Ungalukku Sonnen.
30 ini Naan Ungaludane Adhigamaai Pesuvadhillai. Indha Ulagaththin Adhipadhi Varugiraan. Avanukku Ennidaththil Ondrumillai.
31 naan Pidhaavil Anbaayirukkirenendrum, Pidhaa Enakku, Kattalaiyittapadiye Seygiren Endrum, Ulagam Ariyumpadikku Ippadi Nadakkum. Ezhundhirungal, Ivvidamvittup Povom Vaarungal Endraar.
